ingredients.ingredient: 1 pint shucked oysters, drained with liquid reserved
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Reserve oyster liquid to moisten the layers and add briny depth to the dish
Combine bread crumbs and buttery crackers for optimal texture contrast
Layer oysters and crumb mixture alternately, finishing with a crumb topping for browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This traditional scalloped oyster dish relies on proper layering and the reserved oyster liquid for moisture. Help the user build beautiful layers and understand how the baking process transforms the components into a cohesive, luxurious side dish.
